mapper.select: select bnum , title , author , content , readcnt , pub , to_char(regdate, 'YY/MM/DD') regdate , (select count(*) from board_comment c where c.bnum = b.bnum) commentCnt from board b order by bnum desc
select count (*) from board where UPPER(author) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%')

select bnum , title , author , content , readcnt , pub , to_char(regdate, 'YY/MM/DD') regdate , (select count(*) from board_comment c where c.bnum = b.bnum) commentCnt from board b where UPPER(b.author) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%') order by bnum desc
select count (*) from board where UPPER(title) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%')

select bnum , title , author , content , readcnt , pub , to_char(regdate, 'YY/MM/DD') regdate , (select count(*) from board_comment c where c.bnum = b.bnum) commentCnt from board b where UPPER(b.title) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%') order by bnum desc
select count (*) from board where UPPER(title) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%') or UPPER(content) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%')

select bnum , title , author , content , readcnt , pub , to_char(regdate, 'YY/MM/DD') regdate , (select count(*) from board_comment c where c.bnum = b.bnum) commentCnt from board b where UPPER(b.title) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%') or UPPER(b.content) like UPPER('%'||#{keyWord}||'%') order by bnum desc
select bnum , title , author , content , readcnt , pub , to_char(regdate, 'YY/MM/DD hh:mm:ss') regdate from board where bnum = #{bnum}
select bnum , cnum , author , content , to_char(regdate, 'YY/MM/DD hh:mm:ss') regdate from board_comment where bnum = #{bnum} order by cnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into board ( bnum , title , author , content , readcnt , pub , regdate) values ( board_seq.NEXTVAL , trim(#{title}) , trim(#{author}) , #{content} , 0 , #{pub} , sysdate )
mapper.update: update board set title = trim(#{title}) , content = trim(#{content}) where bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment ( bnum , cnum , author , content , regdate) values ( #{bnum} , comment_seq.NEXTVAL , #{author} , #{content} , sysdate)
insert into board_file ( bnum , fnum , oriName , savName) values ( (select max(bnum) from board) , file_seq.nextval , #{oriName} , #{savName})
mapper.select: select * from board_file where bnum = #{bnum} order by fnum desc
mapper.update: update board set readcnt = readcnt+1 where bnum = #{bnum}
